A4.text: Woodley was cast as the main character, Amy Juergens, in the ABC Family series The Secret Life of the American Teenager (2008–2013)

A6.text: She played the role of Adrian Lee in the hit ABC Family drama, The Secret Life of the American Teenager, from its beginning in July 2008, until the series finale in early June 2013.

A8.text: She is known for her portrayal of Grace Bowman in the television series The Secret Life of the American Teenager.
